Pre-Game Insights: India will go in as the overwhelming favourites yet again.
Pakistan will need their pacers to be in top form to defeat India in the T20 World Cup match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pricing of the tickets is being cited as the major reason, with the $300 general admission tickets all being sold out.
The New York pitches have been producing a lot of seam movement and bounce.
The matches in New York are being played on drop-in pitches brought in from Australia and prepared in Florida.
Others: Wasim Akram has already said that Pakistan will struggle to qualify for the next round - the Super Eights.
India boast of a good fast bowling attack too.
